title: Bitcoin chatter surges as price recovers, US govt shutdown nears end
summary: The Senate passed a bill on Monday to end the record US government shutdown, while Bitcoin has been trending on social media as it surged 6.7% past $106,000.

title: TeraWulf Q3 revenue up 87% as Bitcoin nearly doubles over the year
summary: TeraWulf reported the average price of Bitcoin during Q3 was $114,390, compared to only $61,023 for the same period last year.

title: Gemini bets on ‘super app’ as stock sinks to record low on Q3 results
summary: Shares in Gemini slumped after the company reported losses in its third-quarter results, largely due to the costs associated with going public.

title: Jack Dorsey’s Square has just opened up 4M merchants to Bitcoin
summary: X users have already reported using the new Bitcoin payment feature at coffee shops across the United States.

title: BitMine snapped up 34% more ETH last week as prices dipped
summary: BitMine’s massive ETH accumulation accelerated last week, adding 110,288 Ether to its $12.5 billion treasury as it targets 5% of the total supply.

title: Biopharma eyes $100M for crypto treasury to back cancer treatment
summary: Propanc Biopharma said it will build a crypto treasury after securing up to $100 million from Hexstone Capital to further its potential cancer treatment and reignite investor interest.

title: Uniswap token jumps 38% after fee switch, burn proposal hits the table
summary: The Uniswap token rose over 38% after the introduction of a protocol fee switch and burning mechanism that could strengthen UNI.

title: Senate committee unveils crypto market structure bill draft
summary: The Senate Agriculture Committee has released a draft bill outlining the proposed regulatory jurisdiction of the country’s two main financial market regulators.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
summary: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Bitdeer shares drop 20% after posting $266M quarterly loss
summary: Bitdeer’s revenue and Bitcoin production jumped in the third quarter amid a push into AI, but its shares slid after the company booked paper losses.
